title: Nirvana In Fire: The Wind Blows In Changlin
alternative_title: Langya List of the Wind Rising Changlin / Langya List of the Wind-Rising Chang Forest / Lángyá Bǎng Zhī Fēng Qǐ Cháng Lín / Nirvana in Fire: The Wind Blows in Changlin / 琅琊榜之风起长林
status: Langya List of the Wind Rising Changlin / Langya List of the Wind-Rising Chang Forest / Lángyá Bǎng Zhī Fēng Qǐ Cháng Lín / Nirvana in Fire: The Wind Blows in Changlin / 琅琊榜之风起长林
description:
Description :
        Fifty years after Mei Changsu's death, history repeats itself. Again there are conflicts in love, in family, the empire, war, and the Inner Palace. Full of secretive and overt schemes, battles and intrigue, the search for justice, and love for country, follow Xiao Pingjing as he uncovers a great conspiracy and returns Da Liang to prosperity!
Langya List of the Wind Rising Changlin / Langya List of the Wind-Rising Chang Forest / Lángyá Bǎng Zhī Fēng Qǐ Cháng Lín / Nirvana in Fire: The Wind Blows in Changlin / 琅琊榜之风起长林
